scripts.start: concurrently "cd micro-front-end-activate && npm run dev " "cd micro-front-end-main && npm run dev" "cd micro-front-end-shell && npm run dev "
scripts.build: concurrently "cd micro-front-end-activate && npm run build " "cd micro-front-end-main && npm run build" "cd micro-front-end-shell && npm run build "
scripts.serve: concurrently "cd micro-front-end-activate && npm start " "cd micro-front-end-main && npm start" "cd micro-front-end-shell && npm start "
